boardgame.name: Panzer Grenadier: Iron Curtain
boardgame.description:
In the years immediately following the defeat of Nazi Germany, some leaders among the victorious Allies believed that war between the two remaining superpowers was not only inevitable, it would come very soon. The United States and the Soviet Union continued to design and build new armored vehicles and other weapons for this looming war, but the “Cold War” would drag on for almost 45 years without ever resulting in open battle.

Iron Curtain is a supplement introducing the post-war weapons of the two superpowers to the Panzer Grenadier system. The scenarios are all hypothetical, of course, but are based on what generals of either side believed would be the course of a war in the years immediately after 1945. This module is not playable by itself, but requires ownership of Road to Berlin and Battle of the Bulge.

For those fascinated by huge tanks with big guns, this is the ultimate in tactical armored wargaming. New pieces include the Soviet Josef Stalin III and Josef Stalin IV heavy tanks, T-44 medium tank and Su101 assault gun. There are also infantry armed with the awesome AK-47 assault rifle, still a front-line weapon around the world 60 years after its development.

An American player will need powerful weapons to counter that arsenal, and Iron Curtain provides. There are M26 “Pershing” heavy tanks, Sherman “Jumbo” assault tanks, M24 Chaffee light tanks, M4 Sherman tanks with a 76mm gun, M28 ultra-heavy assault tanks, and M29, M30 and M32 heavy tanks. Plus M36 tank destroyers, M39 full-tracked armored personnel carriers, and 90mm anti-tank guns.

This game is part of the Panzer Grenadier series

All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%).

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de).
Our Terms and Conditions
1. General
All transactions between Gamers HQ and you, the customer, are subject to the following conditions, which you acknowledge by accepting delivery of your ordered products. These conditions do not affect your statutory rights and in all cases German law applies.
2. Orders and prices
We do our level best to ensure that the information on our website is up-to-date. Please note that offers and prices are subject to change. We work to ensure that our prices are all correct, but cannot be held responsible for accidentally displaying the wrong price of a product.
All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes.
3. Lead times and delivery costs
Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction.
Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros.
Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs.
4. Payment options
We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. Once you have placed three orders, we also offer you the option to pay by invoice. Such privileges can, however, be withdrawn should we encounter repeated delays in settling invoices.
5. Cancellations, Refunds & Returns Should you wish to cancel your order, you can do so by notifying us by fax, email, letter or by simply returning your product(s) to Gamers HQ. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification. Please ensure that any products returned are in good condition. If you check the products in a manner that you will have done, for example, in a shop, this is fine. Any other handling of the product(s) might entitle Gamers HQ to some compensation from you, which might in rare cases amount to the original sum paid for the product(s). So should you feel that you might cancel your order by returning the products, please limit your inspection of the products to optical checks and do not use them on a regular basis. If you return your order within two weeks in the above manner, we shall refund you the costs for sending the product(s) back to us (unless your cancelled order amounts less than 20 euros, in which case you as the customer will bear the cost of return postage). Please ensure that you use appropriate packing material when sending back the product(s) — preferably using the original wrapping. Please note that German law, following the EU directive 97/7/EG of 20 May 1997, specifies that the right to return items and receive a full refund is not applicable to the purchase of newspapers, magazines or journals (§312d BGB) as well as the purchase of audio- or video-recordings and software once you have broken the seal of the package. Should we accidently send you the wrong products, please return them to us and we shall refund you the return postage immediately. Any cancellation of an order has to be done in writing (by post, fax or email). 6. Ownership
Please note that ordered products remain our property until you have fully paid for them.
7. Personal data
We are committed to protecting your personal information and will keep the information you entrust to us safely and securely. We may collect information from you to monitor website visitor patterns, so that we can improve our website. We also collect information from you to handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments, communicate with you about orders, products and services, update our records and generally maintain your customer profile with us. However, we shall never sell or share your personal information with third parties. Our customer data — in so far as required to provide the above services and within the limits defined by the data protection laws of Germany (paragraph 26 BDSG) — is saved and handled on a separate, network-independent computer.
8. Other matters
We reserve the right to reject orders without any explanation. Also please note that you as a customer cannot assert a claim against Gamers HQ if, for whatever reason, we are unable to source the item(s) you have ordered. Such cases arise only very exceptionally; we try to ensure that everything we advertise in our web shop is in stock. Where, for whatever reason, we are unable to deliver we promptly refund in full everything you have paid.
9. Limitation of liability: external links
Although we check the content of external links provided on our website, we have no control over or responsibility for these domains to which we provide the links or which link to us. That responsibility solely rests with those who manage the respective domains.
10. Place of jurisdiction
Any disputes arising hereunder will be settled before a Berlin court. We reserve the right to choose the customer's place of jurisdiction instead.
11. Severability clause
If parts of these terms and conditions become ineffective, the remainder of these terms still apply.

Rückgaberecht Sie können ohne Angabe von Gründen durch Erklärung per Fax, E-Mail oder einfaches Briefschreiben oder durch Rücksendung unserer Waren eine Bestellung widerrufen. Für die Absendung der Widerrufserklärung oder unserer Waren ist eine Widerrufsfrist von zwei Wochen einzuhalten, die mit Eingang unserer Lieferung bei Ihnen beginnt. Ein Widerrufsrecht steht Ihnen - auch innerhalb der Widerrufsfrist - in keinem Fall bei folgenden Waren zu: - Audio- oder Videoaufzeichnungen bzw. Software, wenn Sie die entsprechenden Datenträger entsiegelt haben, - Zeitungen, Zeitschriften und Illustrierten. Unsere Ware ist sofort nach der fristgerechten Ausübung des Widerrufsrechts auf unsere Kosten und Gefahr an uns zurückzusenden, wenn der Widerruf nicht bereits durch Rücksendung ausgeübt wurde. Achten Sie bitte bei der Rücksendung darauf, dass Sie eine geeignete Verpackung benutzen, vorzugsweise die Originalverpackung. Ausnahmsweise sind die Kosten der Rücksendung von Ihnen zu tragen, wenn der Rechnungswert unserer Ware nicht mehr als Euro 20,00 beträgt. In keinem Fall haben Sie die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, wenn die von uns gelieferte Ware nicht der bestellten Ware entspricht. Sollten Sie bereits den Kaufpreis für die Ware bezahlt haben, werden wir diesen nach einem Widerruf unverzüglich zurückerstatten. Wenn Sie unsere Ware nach dem Widerruf ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurücksenden, sind Sie uns gesetzlich zu Wertersatz verpflichtet. Das gilt nicht, soweit Sie unsere Ware lediglich so geprüft haben, wie Sie es z.B. im Ladengeschäft hätten tun können. Jede darüber hinausgehende Nutzung der Ware berechtigt uns jedoch zu Ersatzansprüchen, die unter Umständen die Höhe des Kaufpreises erreichen können. Sollten Sie also einen Widerruf in Betracht ziehen, beschränken Sie sich möglichst auf eine optische Prüfung und nehmen Sie die Ware nicht regulär in Gebrauch. 6. Eigentumsvorbehalt Gelieferte Artikel bleiben bis zur vollständigen Bezahlung Eigentum der Firma Gamers-HQ. 7. Datenspeicherung Unsere Kundendaten – soweit geschäftsnotwendig und im Rahmen des Bundes­datenschutzgesetzes (Paragraph 26 BDSG) zulässig – werden EDV-mäßig gespeichert und verarbeitet (auf einem netzexternen Rechner). Kundendaten werden unter keinen Umständen Dritten zur Verfügung gestellt. 8. Sonstiges Die Ablehnung von Aufträgen, auch ohne Angaben von Gründen, behalten wir uns ausdrücklich vor. Aus Lieferschwierigkeiten unsererseits erwachsen keinerlei Ansprüche gegen das Gamers-HQ. Können Bestellungen aus irgendwelchen Gründen nicht ausgeführt werden, werden bereits geleistete Zahlungen umgehend zurückerstattet. 9. Haftungshinweis Trotz sorgfältiger inhaltlicher Kontrolle übernehmen wir keine Haftung für die Inhalte externer Links. boardgame.name: Agrarisch aan- & verkoopspel
boardgame.description:
The Agrarisch aan- & verkoopspel (Agrarian sell and buy-game) is a roll and move game produced by the Dutch agrarian cooperation Cebeco and "De Boerenbond" a Dutch agrarian retail cooperation.

Players expand their farm with livestock, greenhouses and tractors on the middle part on the game-board. On the outer track of the gameboard players move their pawn in a roll and move style, landing on some spaces gives the player the chance to buy above additions to their farms. Other spaces on the outer track can make the player sell produce, enter a cooperation, damage others property, change the market price, pay upkeep or draw a chance card.

boardgame.name: Solitaire Tiles
boardgame.description:
Solitaire Tiles is a variant of the classic solitaire game Klondike. It can be played solo using standard Klondike rules or can be played using a point system. Each tile has a different point value so choosing the right tile to play can affect your score.

In the two player game, players take turns placing tiles. Points are score for playing your own tiles but not your opponents. As different tiles have different point values, it may sometimes be beneficial to play an opponents tile to block him from getting the points.

The game uses a standard "deck" of 52 tiles plus an 4 special tiles (wild & swirls).

boardgame.name: Union Pacific-opoly
boardgame.description:
from the publisher's website:

A game for train lovers across America!

More than 140 years ago, President Abraham Lincoln signed the Pacific Railroad Act. With this historic stroke of a pen, the stage was set for Union Pacific to open the American West to settlers and, in the process, connect a continent. The transcontinental route heralded the Industrial Revolution and modernized transportation, turning the grueling, six-month, $1,000 journey from New York to San Francisco into a week long trip costing a mere $70.

It took an army of 20,000 men, working 12 to 16 hours a day, seven days a week, for six years, to connect America east to west by rail. It was a remarkable feat, as the system was built primarily by hand. With the driving of the Golden Spike on May 10, 1869, the route was complete, and a vast, largely unpopulated region was poised for growth.

Today, the 50,000 men and women of Union Pacific still connect America’s communities, transporting the raw materials and finished goods that keep our economy, and our country, moving.

Tokens include: Railroad crossing signal; Engineer’s cap, Golden Spike, Caboose, Locomotive, and a Lantern.

boardgame.name: Ice Cream-opoly
boardgame.description:
from the publisher's website:

It’s our nation’s favorite dessert! We all scream for ice cream! In fact, the average American eats 22 quarts of ice cream per year. We’re the ice cream capital of the world, producing over 1.5 billion gallons of ice cream each year. Seems like most of us just find the stuff to be irresistible!

Ice Cream-opoly is a game celebrating our love of this frozen delight. Players buy favorite ice cream flavors then increase property values by collecting Ice Cream Parlors and trading them in for Ice Cream Factories. It sounds easy enough but pay your double dip fee, get busted in a late night freezer raid, or have the really bad luck of developing Brain Freeze and it becomes a little more difficult, and a lot more fun!

So advance to Scoop! Who knows! You may soon be elected president of the Ice Cream Dream Team…or you may be buying Sugar-Free Toe-Phooey. Gather family and friends. This is one delicious game. And whatever happens, remember - not much goes wrong that a little ice cream won’t fix!

6 custom tokens: Ice Cream Cone, Spoon, Big Smile, Dairy Cow, Scoop, Sundae

boardgame.name: Grillin-opoly
boardgame.description:
from the publisher's website:

Fire up!

Half a million years ago, either by design or by accident, humans began to cook meat over fire – and we’ve been grilling ever since! In fact, grilling has become one of our most universally enjoyed human experiences. We grill year round, from the East Coast to the West Coast, shoveling snow, swatting flies, huddled under umbrellas, whatever heroics required to keep the fires stoked.

Grillin’-opoly is a game celebrating this fiery phenomenon. Players buy favorite grillin’ properties, then increase their property value by collecting Briquets, and trading them in for Propane Tanks. It sounds easy enough, but lose your License to Grill, have to kiss the cook, or get sent to Burnt to a Crisp, and it becomes a little more difficult…and a lot more fun!

So advance to Fire Up! Who knows! You may soon be designated “Natural Born Griller,” – or you may be diggin’ your burned dog out of the pit! Whatever happens, Grillin’-opoly is a rare treat for all who appreciate THE THRILL OF THE GRILL!

6 custom tokens: Salt Shaker, Corn on the Cob, Hot Dog, Cheeseburger, T-Bone Steak, Pepper
